name: batch_update_document
description: Applies a collection of updates to a document in a single operation.

documentId.description: The unique identifier of the document to update.

index.description:
The zero-based index in the document's content
                           where the text will be inserted.

location.description: Specifies where to insert the text.

documentStyle.description:
The new document style to apply. The specific
                               structure of this dictionary will depend on how
                               document styles are defined in your system.

requests.description: A list of update requests to apply to the document. Each request is a dictionary containing a single key that identifies its type, such as `'insertText'`. The value for this key is another dictionary containing the parameters for that specific request.

userId.description: The ID of the user. If this parameter is not specified, it defaults to `me`.

name: create_document
description: Create a new document, optionally providing a title. The `userId` must be a non-empty string and defaults to 'me'.

title.description: The title of the document. This parameter is a string that defaults to "Untitled Document".

userId.description: The ID of the user. It defaults to "me" and must be a non-empty string.

name: get_document
description: Retrieves a document using its unique ID, which must be a non-empty string. This function allows optional control over the suggestions view mode, inclusion of tab content, and the specific user performing the action, returning a dictionary that contains the document's primary fields and associated data like comments and permissions.

documentId.description: The ID of the document to retrieve. This ID cannot be empty or consist only of whitespace characters.

suggestionsViewMode.description: Specifies the mode for viewing suggestions, accepting string values such as "DEFAULT" or "SUGGESTIONS_INLINE". If `None` is provided, the document's existing suggestion viewing setting is preserved.

includeTabsContent.description: A boolean parameter that controls whether the document's tab content is included in the returned data. When set to `True`, the `tabs` field will be present in the document. This parameter defaults to `False`.

userId.description: The ID of the user performing the action. This parameter defaults to "me" and cannot be empty or consist solely of whitespace.
